tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_26: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'Ta, Seen, Meem.',verse: 2802,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'These are the verses of the clear Book.',verse: 2803,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.',verse: 2804,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.',verse: 2805,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.',verse: 2806,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.',verse: 2807,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'Did they not look at the earth -  how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?',verse: 2808,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2809,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2810,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -',verse: 2811,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah ?"',verse: 2812,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: 'He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me',verse: 2813,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron.',verse: 2814,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me."',verse: 2815,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: '[ Allah ] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening.',verse: 2816,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,',verse: 2817,},ayah_17: {image: '',text: '[Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"',verse: 2818,},ayah_18: {image: '',text: '[Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?',verse: 2819,},ayah_19: {image: '',text: 'And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful."',verse: 2820,},ayah_20: {image: '',text: '[Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.',verse: 2821,},ayah_21: {image: '',text: 'So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers.',verse: 2822,},ayah_22: {image: '',text: 'And is this a favor of which you remind me -  that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?"',verse: 2823,},ayah_23: {image: '',text: 'Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds?"',verse: 2824,},ayah_24: {image: '',text: '[Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced."',verse: 2825,},ayah_25: {image: '',text: '[Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear?"',verse: 2826,},ayah_26: {image: '',text: '[Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers."',verse: 2827,},ayah_27: {image: '',text: '[Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."',verse: 2828,},ayah_28: {image: '',text: '[Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason."',verse: 2829,},ayah_29: {image: '',text: '[Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned."',verse: 2830,},ayah_30: {image: '',text: '[Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest?"',verse: 2831,},ayah_31: {image: '',text: '[Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful."',verse: 2832,},ayah_32: {image: '',text: 'So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.',verse: 2833,},ayah_33: {image: '',text: 'And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers.',verse: 2834,},ayah_34: {image: '',text: '[Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.',verse: 2835,},ayah_35: {image: '',text: 'He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise?"',verse: 2836,},ayah_36: {image: '',text: 'They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers',verse: 2837,},ayah_37: {image: '',text: 'Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician."',verse: 2838,},ayah_38: {image: '',text: 'So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.',verse: 2839,},ayah_39: {image: '',text: 'And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate',verse: 2840,},ayah_40: {image: '',text: 'That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"',verse: 2841,},ayah_41: {image: '',text: 'And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"',verse: 2842,},ayah_42: {image: '',text: 'He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."',verse: 2843,},ayah_43: {image: '',text: 'Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."',verse: 2844,},ayah_44: {image: '',text: 'So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."',verse: 2845,},ayah_45: {image: '',text: 'Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.',verse: 2846,},ayah_46: {image: '',text: 'So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah ].',verse: 2847,},ayah_47: {image: '',text: 'They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,',verse: 2848,},ayah_48: {image: '',text: 'The Lord of Moses and Aaron."',verse: 2849,},ayah_49: {image: '',text: '[Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."',verse: 2850,},ayah_50: {image: '',text: 'They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.',verse: 2851,},ayah_51: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."',verse: 2852,},ayah_52: {image: '',text: 'And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."',verse: 2853,},ayah_53: {image: '',text: 'Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers',verse: 2854,},ayah_54: {image: '',text: '[And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,',verse: 2855,},ayah_55: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, they are enraging us,',verse: 2856,},ayah_56: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, we are a cautious society... "',verse: 2857,},ayah_57: {image: '',text: 'So We removed them from gardens and springs',verse: 2858,},ayah_58: {image: '',text: 'And treasures and honorable station -',verse: 2859,},ayah_59: {image: '',text: 'Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.',verse: 2860,},ayah_60: {image: '',text: 'So they pursued them at sunrise.',verse: 2861,},ayah_61: {image: '',text: 'And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"',verse: 2862,},ayah_62: {image: '',text: '[Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."',verse: 2863,},ayah_63: {image: '',text: 'Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.',verse: 2864,},ayah_64: {image: '',text: 'And We advanced thereto the pursuers.',verse: 2865,},ayah_65: {image: '',text: 'And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.',verse: 2866,},ayah_66: {image: '',text: 'Then We drowned the others.',verse: 2867,},ayah_67: {image: '',text: 'Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2868,},ayah_68: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2869,},ayah_69: {image: '',text: 'And recite to them the news of Abraham,',verse: 2870,},ayah_70: {image: '',text: 'When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"',verse: 2871,},ayah_71: {image: '',text: 'They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."',verse: 2872,},ayah_72: {image: '',text: 'He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?',verse: 2873,},ayah_73: {image: '',text: 'Or do they benefit you, or do they harm?"',verse: 2874,},ayah_74: {image: '',text: 'They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus."',verse: 2875,},ayah_75: {image: '',text: 'He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping,',verse: 2876,},ayah_76: {image: '',text: 'You and your ancient forefathers?',verse: 2877,},ayah_77: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds,',verse: 2878,},ayah_78: {image: '',text: 'Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me.',verse: 2879,},ayah_79: {image: '',text: 'And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.',verse: 2880,},ayah_80: {image: '',text: 'And when I am ill, it is He who cures me',verse: 2881,},ayah_81: {image: '',text: 'And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life',verse: 2882,},ayah_82: {image: '',text: 'And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense."',verse: 2883,},ayah_83: {image: '',text: '[And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.',verse: 2884,},ayah_84: {image: '',text: 'And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations.',verse: 2885,},ayah_85: {image: '',text: 'And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.',verse: 2886,},ayah_86: {image: '',text: 'And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.',verse: 2887,},ayah_87: {image: '',text: 'And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -',verse: 2888,},ayah_88: {image: '',text: 'The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children',verse: 2889,},ayah_89: {image: '',text: 'But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."',verse: 2890,},ayah_90: {image: '',text: 'And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.',verse: 2891,},ayah_91: {image: '',text: 'And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,',verse: 2892,},ayah_92: {image: '',text: 'And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship',verse: 2893,},ayah_93: {image: '',text: 'Other than Allah ? Can they help you or help themselves?"',verse: 2894,},ayah_94: {image: '',text: 'So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators',verse: 2895,},ayah_95: {image: '',text: 'And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.',verse: 2896,},ayah_96: {image: '',text: 'They will say while they dispute therein,',verse: 2897,},ayah_97: {image: '',text: '"By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error',verse: 2898,},ayah_98: {image: '',text: 'When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 2899,},ayah_99: {image: '',text: 'And no one misguided us except the criminals.',verse: 2900,},ayah_100: {image: '',text: 'So now we have no intercessors',verse: 2901,},ayah_101: {image: '',text: 'And not a devoted friend.',verse: 2902,},ayah_102: {image: '',text: 'Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers... "',verse: 2903,},ayah_103: {image: '',text: 'Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2904,},ayah_104: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2905,},ayah_105: {image: '',text: 'The people of Noah denied the messengers',verse: 2906,},ayah_106: {image: '',text: 'When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah ?',verse: 2907,},ayah_107: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.',verse: 2908,},ayah_108: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me.',verse: 2909,},ayah_109: {image: '',text: 'And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 2910,},ayah_110: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me."',verse: 2911,},ayah_111: {image: '',text: 'They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]?"',verse: 2912,},ayah_112: {image: '',text: 'He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do?',verse: 2913,},ayah_113: {image: '',text: 'Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive.',verse: 2914,},ayah_114: {image: '',text: 'And I am not one to drive away the believers.',verse: 2915,},ayah_115: {image: '',text: 'I am only a clear warner."',verse: 2916,},ayah_116: {image: '',text: 'They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."',verse: 2917,},ayah_117: {image: '',text: 'He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.',verse: 2918,},ayah_118: {image: '',text: 'Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."',verse: 2919,},ayah_119: {image: '',text: 'So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship.',verse: 2920,},ayah_120: {image: '',text: 'Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones.',verse: 2921,},ayah_121: {image: '',text: 'Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2922,},ayah_122: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2923,},ayah_123: {image: '',text: ''Aad denied the messengers',verse: 2924,},ayah_124: {image: '',text: 'When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah ?',verse: 2925,},ayah_125: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.',verse: 2926,},ayah_126: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me.',verse: 2927,},ayah_127: {image: '',text: 'And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 2928,},ayah_128: {image: '',text: 'Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves,',verse: 2929,},ayah_129: {image: '',text: 'And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally?',verse: 2930,},ayah_130: {image: '',text: 'And when you strike, you strike as tyrants.',verse: 2931,},ayah_131: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me.',verse: 2932,},ayah_132: {image: '',text: 'And fear He who provided you with that which you know,',verse: 2933,},ayah_133: {image: '',text: 'Provided you with grazing livestock and children',verse: 2934,},ayah_134: {image: '',text: 'And gardens and springs.',verse: 2935,},ayah_135: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."',verse: 2936,},ayah_136: {image: '',text: 'They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors.',verse: 2937,},ayah_137: {image: '',text: 'This is not but the custom of the former peoples,',verse: 2938,},ayah_138: {image: '',text: 'And we are not to be punished."',verse: 2939,},ayah_139: {image: '',text: 'And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2940,},ayah_140: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2941,},ayah_141: {image: '',text: 'Thamud denied the messengers',verse: 2942,},ayah_142: {image: '',text: 'When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah ?',verse: 2943,},ayah_143: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.',verse: 2944,},ayah_144: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me.',verse: 2945,},ayah_145: {image: '',text: 'And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 2946,},ayah_146: {image: '',text: 'Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death],',verse: 2947,},ayah_147: {image: '',text: 'Within gardens and springs',verse: 2948,},ayah_148: {image: '',text: 'And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit?',verse: 2949,},ayah_149: {image: '',text: 'And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.',verse: 2950,},ayah_150: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me.',verse: 2951,},ayah_151: {image: '',text: 'And do not obey the order of the transgressors,',verse: 2952,},ayah_152: {image: '',text: 'Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend."',verse: 2953,},ayah_153: {image: '',text: 'They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.',verse: 2954,},ayah_154: {image: '',text: 'You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."',verse: 2955,},ayah_155: {image: '',text: 'He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day.',verse: 2956,},ayah_156: {image: '',text: 'And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day."',verse: 2957,},ayah_157: {image: '',text: 'But they hamstrung her and so became regretful.',verse: 2958,},ayah_158: {image: '',text: 'And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2959,},ayah_159: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2960,},ayah_160: {image: '',text: 'The people of Lot denied the messengers',verse: 2961,},ayah_161: {image: '',text: 'When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah ?',verse: 2962,},ayah_162: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.',verse: 2963,},ayah_163: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me.',verse: 2964,},ayah_164: {image: '',text: 'And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 2965,},ayah_165: {image: '',text: 'Do you approach males among the worlds',verse: 2966,},ayah_166: {image: '',text: 'And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing."',verse: 2967,},ayah_167: {image: '',text: 'They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."',verse: 2968,},ayah_168: {image: '',text: 'He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].',verse: 2969,},ayah_169: {image: '',text: 'My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."',verse: 2970,},ayah_170: {image: '',text: 'So We saved him and his family, all,',verse: 2971,},ayah_171: {image: '',text: 'Except an old woman among those who remained behind.',verse: 2972,},ayah_172: {image: '',text: 'Then We destroyed the others.',verse: 2973,},ayah_173: {image: '',text: 'And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.',verse: 2974,},ayah_174: {image: '',text: 'Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2975,},ayah_175: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2976,},ayah_176: {image: '',text: 'The companions of the thicket denied the messengers',verse: 2977,},ayah_177: {image: '',text: 'When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah ?',verse: 2978,},ayah_178: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.',verse: 2979,},ayah_179: {image: '',text: 'So fear Allah and obey me.',verse: 2980,},ayah_180: {image: '',text: 'And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 2981,},ayah_181: {image: '',text: 'Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.',verse: 2982,},ayah_182: {image: '',text: 'And weigh with an even balance.',verse: 2983,},ayah_183: {image: '',text: 'And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption.',verse: 2984,},ayah_184: {image: '',text: 'And fear He who created you and the former creation."',verse: 2985,},ayah_185: {image: '',text: 'They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.',verse: 2986,},ayah_186: {image: '',text: 'You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.',verse: 2987,},ayah_187: {image: '',text: 'So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."',verse: 2988,},ayah_188: {image: '',text: 'He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."',verse: 2989,},ayah_189: {image: '',text: 'And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.',verse: 2990,},ayah_190: {image: '',text: 'Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.',verse: 2991,},ayah_191: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, your Lord -  He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.',verse: 2992,},ayah_192: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.',verse: 2993,},ayah_193: {image: '',text: 'The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down',verse: 2994,},ayah_194: {image: '',text: 'Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] -  that you may be of the warners -',verse: 2995,},ayah_195: {image: '',text: 'In a clear Arabic language.',verse: 2996,},ayah_196: {image: '',text: 'And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.',verse: 2997,},ayah_197: {image: '',text: 'And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?',verse: 2998,},ayah_198: {image: '',text: 'And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners',verse: 2999,},ayah_199: {image: '',text: 'And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.',verse: 3000,},ayah_200: {image: '',text: 'Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.',verse: 3001,},ayah_201: {image: '',text: 'They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.',verse: 3002,},ayah_202: {image: '',text: 'And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.',verse: 3003,},ayah_203: {image: '',text: 'And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"',verse: 3004,},ayah_204: {image: '',text: 'So for Our punishment are they impatient?',verse: 3005,},ayah_205: {image: '',text: 'Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years',verse: 3006,},ayah_206: {image: '',text: 'And then there came to them that which they were promised?',verse: 3007,},ayah_207: {image: '',text: 'They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.',verse: 3008,},ayah_208: {image: '',text: 'And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners',verse: 3009,},ayah_209: {image: '',text: 'As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.',verse: 3010,},ayah_210: {image: '',text: 'And the devils have not brought the revelation down.',verse: 3011,},ayah_211: {image: '',text: 'It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.',verse: 3012,},ayah_212: {image: '',text: 'Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.',verse: 3013,},ayah_213: {image: '',text: 'So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.',verse: 3014,},ayah_214: {image: '',text: 'And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.',verse: 3015,},ayah_215: {image: '',text: 'And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.',verse: 3016,},ayah_216: {image: '',text: 'And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."',verse: 3017,},ayah_217: {image: '',text: 'And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,',verse: 3018,},ayah_218: {image: '',text: 'Who sees you when you arise',verse: 3019,},ayah_219: {image: '',text: 'And your movement among those who prostrate.',verse: 3020,},ayah_220: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.',verse: 3021,},ayah_221: {image: '',text: 'Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?',verse: 3022,},ayah_222: {image: '',text: 'They descend upon every sinful liar.',verse: 3023,},ayah_223: {image: '',text: 'They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.',verse: 3024,},ayah_224: {image: '',text: 'And the poets -  [only] the deviators follow them;',verse: 3025,},ayah_225: {image: '',text: 'Do you not see that in every valley they roam',verse: 3026,},ayah_226: {image: '',text: 'And that they say what they do not do? -',verse: 3027,},ayah_227: {image: '',text: 'Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.',verse: 3028,},name: surah_26,};
